# AlphaSMB

> AlphaSMB is an AI transformation consultancy that helps SMB leadership
> teams (20-500 employees) build AI-capable organizations. Founded by
> Zach Henderson, fractional Head of AI at Aurora WDC (Fortune 1000).
> Core insight: AI isn't a tool decision — it's a capability decision
> that changes where you can compete, how you can win, and what your
> business can become.

## Key Pages

- [Home](https://alphasmb.com/): Overview, strategic positioning, methodology, services
- [AI Strategy Call](https://alphasmb.com/services/strategy-call): Service details, pricing, FAQ, why a strategy call vs pilot
- [About Zach Henderson](https://alphasmb.com/about): Credentials, philosophy
- [Book a Call](https://alphasmb.com/book): Schedule and pay ($500)
- [Privacy Policy](https://alphasmb.com/privacy): Data handling practices

## Core Philosophy

AI transformation fails when treated as a tool rollout. Organizational
capability must come first — build the mindset, find the champion, activate
high-agency people, then measure against benchmarks. You can't plan an AI
strategy without first building the AI capability.

## About the Founder

Zach Henderson — Fractional Head of AI at Aurora WDC (Fortune 1000),
Epic Systems alum, 20+ years across healthcare, real estate,
manufacturing & software.

## Services

One-Hour AI Strategy Call ($500): AI readiness assessment, industry
benchmarking, three-phase transformation roadmap, execution scorecard,
48-hour action plan. Maps how AI capability changes competitive options.
Delivered as branded PDF.

Full Transformation Engagement (custom pricing): Up to 3 months embedded
with organization. Champion identification, phased change management,
weekly progress scoring. Limited to 2 clients at a time.
